markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shory Aerialist](/Feats.aspx?ID=959) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 15 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity; [Shory Aeromancer](/Feats.aspx?ID=955) or ability to cast [_fly_](/Spells.aspx?ID=125)

</column>

---

Unique in Golarion’s history, the Shory people developed fighting styles dedicated to combat in the air. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks to Maneuver in Flight and a +5-foot status bonus to your fly Speed whenever you are flying via magic.
name: Shory Aerialist
prerequisite: Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity; Shory Aeromancer or ability to cast _fly_

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to Maneuver in Flight and a +5-foot status bonus to your fly Speed whenever you are flying via magic.
